content: Claims processing report for Midwest Regional from October 2023 shows a 12% increase in cataract surgery approvals. Policy MRH-459 took effect on 10/1/23, expanding coverage for advanced lens implants. Patient ID NP-8832-776 had bilateral surgery delayed due to policy transition coding errors. Dr. Elise Vang (Ophthalmology Associates) filed 8 appeals related to this issue in Q4.
